TopicTitle: My first attempt at making a cinematic

Articles.Content:
Made a cinematic on a probe mun lander i made, working on the end of it now just wanted to put this much out to see if their was any interest.

Thanks for watching =)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/_6R-ZxYUqlU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

You should try Camera tools. Makes a huge difference.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-13T08:53:18Z" title="08/13/2015 08:53  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 13, 2015</time> by Derpiderp**

Nice you could cut in some scenes using [Camera Tools](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/190/Camera%20Tools) and use this to get rid of the time warp message [ScreenMessageHider](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1060/ScreenMessageHider)

Also I would go into the options and remove the camera wobble. Good first video tho. Keep it up ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
